sourcesContent:
<template>
  <a-layout class="layout">
    <a-layout-header class="header-one">
      <!-- 搜索框 -->
      <a-input-search
        placeholder="请输入查询条件"
        @search="onSearch"
        style="margin-bottom: 16px"
      />
    </a-layout-header>
    <a-layout-content class="content">
      <!-- 表格 -->
      <a-table
        :columns="columns"
        :dataSource="data"
        :pagination="pagination"
        @change="handleTableChange"
      />
    </a-layout-content>
  </a-layout>
</template>

<script>
import { Table, Input, Layout } from "ant-design-vue";

export default {
  components: {
    "a-table": Table,
    "a-input-search": Input.Search,
    "a-layout": Layout,
    "a-layout-header": Layout.Header,
    "a-layout-content": Layout.Content,
  },
  data() {
    return {
      // 表格数据
      data: [
        {
          key: "1",
          name: "John Doe",
          age: 32,
          address: "New York No. 1 Lake Park",
        },
        // 更多数据...
      ],
      // 表格列
      columns: [
        {
          title: "Name",
          dataIndex: "name",
          key: "name",
        },
        {
          title: "Age",
          dataIndex: "age",
          key: "age",
        },
        {
          title: "Address",
          dataIndex: "address",
          key: "address",
        },
      ],
      // 分页配置
      pagination: {
        current: 1,
        pageSize: 10,
      },
    };
  },
  methods: {
    // 搜索事件
    onSearch(value) {
      console.log("Search:", value);
      // 根据 value 来过滤或查询数据
    },
    // 表格变化事件
    handleTableChange(pagination, filters, sorter) {
      console.log(pagination, filters, sorter);
      // 根据分页、筛选、排序来更新数据
    },
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.layout {
  height: 100vh;
  background: #f0f2f5;
}

.header-one {
  background: #001529;
  padding: 0 16px;
  height: 50px;
}

.content {
  padding: 16px;
}
</style>
